ca.ualberta.cs.oneclick_cookbook

Class ViewFullRecipeActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.oneclick_cookbook.ViewFullRecipeActivity

  • public class ViewFullRecipeActivity
extends Activity
    Class that acts as the controller for the create recipe screen If the current recipe variable in GlobalApplication is set, does not create a new recipe, rather edits (but is limited to only pictures) the current one. Is responsible for unsetting the current recipe for future instances to work correctly.
    Author:
    Kenneth Armstrong, Kim Kramer

    • Method Detail

      • onResume

        public void onResume()

      • onKeyDown

        public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode,
                KeyEvent event)
        Overides the back key action. Kills the current activity, as normal, but also sets the current recipe to null so that future recipes work properly.

      • setInfo

        public void setInfo(Recipe recipe)
        Function that takes the info of the recipe being edited and puts in into the text fields. This is used to restore any info the use may have had prior to leaving the activity.
        Parameters:
        recipe - The recipe to set the info for

      • setImage

        public void setImage(Recipe recipe)

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)

      • clickHandler

        public void clickHandler(View v)
        Function that handles the clicks from a user. Calls the appropriate function depending on the buton the user clicked.
        Parameters:
        v - The view of the button that was clicked

      • onDone

        public void onDone()
        Function that is called when the user clicks on the done button of the recipe. Exits the create recipe activity.

      • onDelete

        public void onDelete()
        Function that is called when the user clicks on the delete button of the recipe.

      • showMessage

        public void showMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Function that displays a message to the user in the current activity
        Parameters:
        message - The message to display

        public void onAddPhoto()
        Function that is called when the user clicks on the add photo button. Derived from the CameraDemo on eClass.

        Function that is called when the user clicks on the remove photo button.
